nodes.docs:
Signs a transaction.

- Docs: https://viem.sh/docs/actions/wallet/signTransaction
- JSON-RPC Methods:
  - JSON-RPC Accounts: [`eth_signTransaction`](https://ethereum.github.io/execution-apis/api-documentation/)
  - Local Accounts: Signs locally. No JSON-RPC request.
